devdoc.details: THIS CONTRACT IS EXPERIMENTAL!  USE AT YOUR OWN RISK

returns._0: The underlying balance of asset tokens

params._cToken: Address of the Compound cToken interface

params.redeemAmount: The amount of yield-bearing tokens to be redeemed

returns._0: The actual amount of tokens that were redeemed.

params.amount: The amount of asset tokens to be supplied

devdoc.title: Defines the functions used to interact with a yield source.  The Prize Pool inherits this contract.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the total balance (in asset tokens).  This includes the deposits and interest.

cToken().notice: Interface for the Yield-bearing cToken by Compound

methods.constructor: Initializes the Yield Service with the Compound cToken

redeem(uint256).notice: Redeems asset tokens from the yield source.

supplyTo(uint256,address).notice: Supplies asset tokens to the yield source.

token().notice: Returns the ERC20 asset token used for deposits.

userdoc.notice: Prize Pools subclasses need to implement this interface so that yield can be generated.
